channel.title: 1 Hit Item Coding
channel.description:
[sub][b]Item Coding[/b]
how do I make an item a one hit kill like on some servers have glowing dagger... what do i search in? what do i do? please help
thank you ::kidd619::[/sub]

item.title: 1 Hit Item Coding
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Open item.cfg with notepad and search for the item you want. Change the very second to last number to 999999 then save and compile, restart server and there you go. Your item should have a strength bonus of 999999.

Read full topic
